item.title: Final Presentation
item.description: class: inverse, middle, center Women and Children First! ###An Exploration into survivors of the RMS Titanic class: center ##Introduction .pull-left[ ] .pull-right[Over 1,500 of the 2,200 people on board died after hitting an iceberg in 1912.] class: center #But! Did the trope of “Women and children first” actually apply on the Titanic? class: center Data The data from this graph came from the CRAN package “titanic” which is intended for machine learning projects.
